references.paper_title: Pixel-level image fusion: A survey of the state of the art
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of pixel-level image fusion techniques, which is fundamental to understanding the broader context of the current work.

references.paper_title: Deep learning in multimodal remote sensing data fusion: A comprehensive review
references.reason: This review focuses on the application of deep learning in multimodal remote sensing data fusion, providing background information on the importance of deep learning approaches in this field.
This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a core component of the proposed CCF method.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper establishes the theoretical foundation for score-based generative models, which underpins the mathematical framework of DDPMs used in the proposed approach.

references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper demonstrates the superior performance of diffusion models over GANs in image synthesis, further motivating the application of DDPMs in image fusion.
